scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Playbills and programmes series (1922-1967) contains many booklets or paper lists of acts or performers associated with a theatrical play or a concert. Presumably the playbills and programmes are from shows that Henriette Metcalf attended. The majority of the playbills and programmes are from plays in New York City, however a few are from europe, such as the Frier Volsbühne programme signed by Maria Piscator.
